prompt: Does this item correspond to the task?

help.title: What does “correspond” mean?
help.html:
Answer YES if the item represents a reasonable interpretation of the task, even if imperfect.
Answer NO if the core subject is missing.

prompt: How diverse are the items in this batch?

help.title: Rating diversity
help.html:
• 1: almost identical
  • 3: some variety
  • 5: very different
